source:
BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR = "abfss://data-integration@sasynwpdlintnpdeve201.dfs.core.windows.net/"
SOURCE_LAKE_RTL_STORE_GRP_PATH = "opco/ppod/domain/store/retailer-cpt-store-grp/lake/2023-09-05-12-49-13/"
STAGE_RTL_STORE_GRP_PATH = "opco/ppod/domain/store/retailer-cpt-store-grp/stage/"
TARGET_RTL_STORE_GRP_PATH = "opco/{opco}/domain/store/retailer-cpt-store-grp/master/"
KEY_COL="grp_id"
VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD = 2
IS_DELTA= False
OPCO_LST = ["ppod", "fdln", "hnfd", "stsh", "gntl", "gntc", "mrtn"]

logger.info("*************************************************************************")
logger.info("\t MDM - STORE - RETAILER - CPT_STOR_GRP - Starting with below parameters")
logger.info("*************************************************************************")
logger.info("\t SOURCE_LAKE_RTL_STORE_GRP_PATH : {0}".format(SOURCE_LAKE_RTL_STORE_GRP_PATH))
logger.info("\t STAGE_RTL_STORE_GRP_PATH : {0}".format(STAGE_RTL_STORE_GRP_PATH))
logger.info("\t TARGET_RTL_STORE_GRP_PATH : {0}".format(TARGET_RTL_STORE_GRP_PATH))
logger.info("\t OPCO_LST : {0}".format(OPCO_LST))
logger.info("\t VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD : {0}".format(VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD))
logger.info("*************************************************************************")

from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, IntegerType, StringType

STAGE_RTL_STORE_GRP_SCHEMA = StructType([
    StructField("grp_id", IntegerType(), False),
    StructField("stor_val", StringType(), False),
    StructField("stor_type_cd", StringType(), False)
    ])

logger.debug("\t schema-defination : Defined the schema for retailer:cpt_stor_grp.\n {0}".format(STAGE_RTL_STORE_GRP_SCHEMA))

from delta.tables import DeltaTable
from pyspark.sql.functions import current_timestamp,lit
from pyspark.sql import functions as f

if(DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_RTL_STORE_GRP_PATH )):
    mssparkutils.fs.rm(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_RTL_STORE_GRP_PATH , recurse = True)
    logger.info("Purging data from STG container {0}".format(STAGE_RTL_STORE_GRP_PATH))


df_stor_grp_lake = spark \
                    .read \
                    .format("parquet") \
                    .schema(STAGE_RTL_STORE_GRP_SCHEMA) \
                    .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + SOURCE_LAKE_RTL_STORE_GRP_PATH )
                   
str_cols=[colname for colname,coltype in df_stor_grp_lake.dtypes if coltype=="string"] 
for colname in str_cols:    
    df_stor_grp_lake=df_stor_grp_lake.withColumn(colname, f.trim(f.col(colname)))

df_stor_grp_lake\
        .sort(KEY_COL) \
        .write \
        .format("delta") \
        .option("inferSchema", "True") \
        .mode("overwrite") \
        .save(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_RTL_STORE_GRP_PATH )
logger.info("\t stg-load: Created STG data from lake source. \n LAKE = {0} \n STG = {1} \n CNT = {2}".format(SOURCE_LAKE_RTL_STORE_GRP_PATH, STAGE_RTL_STORE_GRP_PATH, df_stor_grp_lake.count()))

from delta.tables import DeltaTable
from pyspark.sql.functions import count_distinct, col
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, when, collect_set

def load_master_data(df_stage, path, opco):
    df_stage\
            .sort(KEY_COL) \
            .write \
            .option("mergeSchema", "true") \
            .mode("overwrite") \
            .format("delta") \
            .save(path)
    logger.info("\t RETAILER:CPT_STOR_GRP Master data written. OPCO = {0}, Count={1}".format(opco, df_stage.count()))

for opco in OPCO_LST:
    logger.info("\t Processing MASTER for RETAILER:CPT_STORE_GRP - OPCO={0}".format(opco))

    df_stor_grp_stage= spark \
                            .read \
                            .format("delta") \
                            .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_RTL_STORE_GRP_PATH)
    logger.info("\t RETAILER:CPT_STOR_GRP loaded from stage. OPCO = {0}, Count={1}".format(opco, df_stor_grp_stage.count()))
    df_enriched_stage=df_stor_grp_stage.groupBy("grp_id","stor_type_cd").agg(
                    when(col("stor_type_cd")=='Z',collect_set("stor_val")).alias("zip"),
                    when(col("stor_type_cd")=='S',collect_set("stor_val")).alias("store_numbers"),
                    when(col("stor_type_cd")=='F',collect_set("stor_val").cast("array<integer>")).alias("ecom_store_ids"),
                    when(col("stor_type_cd")=='P',collect_set("stor_val").cast("array<integer>")).alias("price_zone_ids")) \
                    .withColumn("tgt_audt_cr_dt_tm", current_timestamp()) \
                    .withColumn("tgt_audt_upd_dt_tm", current_timestamp()) \
                    .withColumn("tgt_audt_cr_id", lit('usr-data-integration')) \
                    .withColumn("tgt_audt_upd_id", lit('usr-data-integration')) 
    if(DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_RTL_STORE_GRP_PATH.format(opco = opco))): 
        df_stor_grp_master= spark \
                            .read \
                            .format("delta") \
                            .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_RTL_STORE_GRP_PATH.format(opco = opco)) 
        logger.info("\t RETAILER:CPT_STOR_GRP loaded from master. OPCO = {0}, Count={1}".format(opco, df_stor_grp_master.count()))
       
        is_val_success= validate_count(df_stor_grp_master,df_enriched_stage,VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD)
   

        if (is_val_success)== True:            
            load_master_data(df_enriched_stage,BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_RTL_STORE_GRP_PATH.format(opco = opco), opco )
            
        else:
            logger.error("\t Failed to override master since threshold is exceding ")
            raise Exception("EXCEEDING_THRESHOLD")        
    else:
        logger.info("\t First Time Master Load")
        load_master_data(df_enriched_stage,BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_RTL_STORE_GRP_PATH.format(opco = opco), opco )
